+
'''Peter Schiff''' is the president of [[Euro Pacific Capital]] Inc., a brokerage firm based in [[Darien, Connecticut|Darien]], [[Connecticut]]. Schiff frequently appears as a guest on [[CNBC]], [[Fox News]], and [[Bloomberg Television]] and is often quoted in major financial publications. He is known for his extremely [[Bear market|bearish views]] on the United States [[stock market]], [[bond market]], the [[US dollar]], and the [[Economy of the United States|United States economy]] in general for which he has earned the nickname "Dr. Doom." He is currently an economic adviser for the [[Ron Paul]] presidential campaign.<ref>http://www.ronpaul2008.com/press-releases/171/peter-schiff-named-economic-advisor-to-the-ron-paul-2008-presidential-campaign]</ref> His father is [[Tax protester (United States)|tax protester]] [[Irwin Schiff]].
'''Peter Schiff''' is the president of [[Euro Pacific Capital]] Inc., a brokerage firm based in [[Darien, Connecticut|Darien]], [[Connecticut]]. Schiff frequently appears as a guest on [[CNBC]], [[Fox News]], and [[Bloomberg Television]] and is often quoted in major financial publications. He is known for his extremely [[Bear market|bearish views]] on the United States [[stock market]], [[bond market]], the [[US dollar]], and the [[Economy of the United States|United States economy]] in general for which he has earned the nickname "Dr. Doom." He is currently an economic adviser for the [[Ron Paul]] presidential campaign.<ref>http://www.ronpaul2008.com/press-releases/171/peter-schiff-named-economic-advisor-to-the-ron-paul-2008-presidential-campaign]</ref> His father is [[Tax protester (United States)|tax protester]] [[Irwin Schiff]].
